Multiplication tables from 1 to 12, Elementary arithmetic for elementary school children, multiplying playing, addition for children, subtraction, multiplication and division,
Elementary arithmetic operations made fun free, additions, subtractions, multiplications  and divisions by catching  the right answers falling from the sky,  upon completion of  each level  your tower gets higher , lets see how high your towel can get . If you are just learning the numbers, don't worry, you can also play by selecting numbers only  where you have to catch the matching number  and built your towel to the starts.

If you want to be the best, not only you have to be very good and fast solving elementary arithmetic operations, but you also have to be very skillful using the gravity ray that attracts numbers faster to you and teleportation power that allows you to get from one point to another instantly skipping the numbers in between.

Visit us at https://www.pugliesegames.com/

There is  3 levels of difficulty to choose from; easy, normal and hard. each with numbers falling faster that the previous level and with  less time to complete it. Beware! in the hard level there is lighting and volcanic rocks that can strike you any moment.

you can also choose your favorite character, each have different levels of speed and  jumping  power.
